website_summaries.verdict: Top-of-the-line outdoor pillows covered in Sunbrella fabric. The quality outweighs the cost.
pros: The set of two 20-inch square pillows is on the lower side of what most Sunbrella pillows go for in price
A number of patterns and colors are available
The thickness of the pillows is perfect: not too plump, not too flat
cons: Barely a complaint, except for a report of the pillows being too plump

customer_reviews.title: Good material, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like Sunbrella. Love all the cushions, heavy duty material and thick....did someone really just say they were too plump? Got them at a great sale price. No stiching problems. I expect them to hold up very well for a long time. When they're on sale again I'll buy a few of the large size!
customer_reviews.author: Maiden

customer_reviews.title: The color was a true match
customer_reviews.text: I never buy any material other than Sunbrella for outdoor cushions and pillows. I was trying to match my newly installed wall mural for my front porch and was a little nervous with finding the right yellow to go with the mural. The pillow matched perfectly to the photo displayed in the online photo! I am so happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Pillows look nice and seem to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pillows in the canvas beige color to replace old throw pillows on a multicolored couch. These pillows seem to be of good quality and will hopefully hold up better than the pillows that were previously on the couch. One thing that I don't love is that the pillows are overstuffed, so if I fall asleep on the couch, they aren't super comfortable to rest my head on. (I feel like my head is going to fall off the pillow.)
customer_reviews.author: Toshie K. Gomyo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the porch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my porch swing-they are the perfect size and plumpness. Colors were true to description.
customer_reviews.author: Konaman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful set of pillows and very reasonably priced. I love the fabric. Looks even better in person. I liked them so much that I bought a second set. I have also purchased solid pillows from this same company with equally fast shipping each time. HUGE fan of this new company. Will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Zucflylady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for screen porch
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are great so far. Very comfortable and perfect for my screen porch - not subjected to direct weather, but definitely subjected to humidity. They will be the perfect solid color with my various seasonal pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jawna

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful on our black rocking chairs. Colors are vibrant and since it’s a covered porch, we don’t have to worry about exposure to the sun, rain and other elements. Quality made!!
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our outdoor porch. The pillows seem to be well made. The pillows look great and the covering is not baggy.
customer_reviews.author: claudia howard

customer_reviews.title: Subpar workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Durable Sunbrella fabric, indigo color same as presented in photo. Workmanship subpar- seam's plastic-looking thread shows in some areas and is coming out. Would not use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for my outdoor chairs. Well made and excellent quality fabric. Can't go wrong with sunbrella fabric! Color is perfect and true to the picture. Was so pleased with the purchase that I bought 4 more pairs of pillows to fit different outdoor decor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, and offer a vast color selection to match any decor.............
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY product!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are plush, thick and elegant. Beautifully sewn as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Romagirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality pillows
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are great quality. However the color was not what i expected. They called them Charcoal Gray on the site, but they are really a mid gray.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping-Maven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great accent color pillows to freshen up existing patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for indoors and out. They are made to last!
customer_reviews.author: MPM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to replace old pillow
customer_reviews.text: I find those pillow to replace missing in my patio set the color also match Thanks
customer_reviews.author: charles azoulay

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors of the pillows. They are fluffy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: It was smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my client, she loved them used them on her couch .
customer_reviews.author: Andre Carlos

customer_reviews.title: color was perfect
customer_reviews.text: The color is what I thought it would be. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: john dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and material for a excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these in Aruba color. They are nice quality not flimsy at all. The stuffed alot and soft .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for outdoor pillows. Fairly large accent pillow, very dark navy, water rolls off them, thick fabric! Love em
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice color and look great with my patio furniture. Great price. Well made. I’m going to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: jcurt

product_meta.title: 1101Design Sunbrella Canvas Macaw Knife Edge Decorative Indoor/Outdoor Square Throw Pillows, Perfect for Patio Décor - Macaw Green 20" (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:20"| Color:Macaw GreenAdd some zest to your outdoor patio decor with these Sunbrella high-performance indoor/outdoor throw or lumbar pillows. We are bringing outside durability inside for everyday use. Add exceptional comfort & style to your patio living room family room or bedroom decor. These sets of square and rectangle pillows feature high performance stain fade & mildew resistant lightweight fabric & optionally trimmed with cording. High performance Sunbrella fabric is designed to endure weather elements & features UV protection. Sunbrella fabric is resistant to mold staining & fading. Sunbrella fabric combines outdoors durability with indoors softness. These decorative outdoor pillows are sold as a set of 2.
feature_bullets: SUNBRELLA FABRIC IS MOLD WEATHER STAIN & FADE RESISTANT: Our outdoor decorative pillows are made with high quality Sunbrella acrylic fabric which is weather mold stain and fade resistant with UV protection - perfect decor for your patio or any outdoor living space!
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY FILLING: This outdoor throw pillow fill includes 100% recycled polyester lightweight fiber filling. Stylish decorative and good for the environment!
SOLD AS A SET OF 2: These indoor outdoor decorative pillows are sold as a set of 2. They are so nice you won’t want just one! Perfect for furniture or high traffic indoor and outdoor use.
MADE IN THE USA SINCE 2009: We take pride in making the best outdoor pillows on the market!
EASY TO CLEAN: Care Instructions: spot clean with mild detergent and water. For stains or mildew add one cup of bleach per gallon of and water rinse thoroughly. Allow to air dry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars56 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
